resources.string: Not supported for this beacon type
During this application, when beacon matches a predefined UUID, an email will be sent to you with the URL of the camera video stream.
During this application, when beacon matches a predefined UUID, an alarm message will be sent to you via email.
During this application, when Beacon matches a predefined UUID, turn the energy meter on. Then, you can double click the Flic button to turn it off.
During this application, the ZWave door sensor will send an email with the URL of the video stream, when the door connected to the sensor opens.
During this application, the ZWave door open sensor will turn energy plug on, when the door connected to the sensor opens.
During this application you can take a (IP)camera snapshot using the Flic button. Use a single click to take the photo and it will automatically be shown on your NeBiT.
During this application you can control a smart plug using the Flic button. Use single click to turn on the smart plug and double click to turn it off.
During this application you can take a camera snapshot by clicking a Flic button. Use a single click to take the photo and it will automatically be shown on your NeBiT.
During this application you can control the mobile torch using a Flic button. Use a single click to turn the torch on and a long click to turn it off.
During this application you can send an audio message WHEREEEEE?????. Use a single click to send MSGA?? or double click to send MSGB????.
During this application, you can control the servo of the camera using your NeBiT slider Thing.
During this application you can control the ZWave SmartPlug using a Switch Thing. When on, the energy consumption is shown on your NEBiT.
